unnormalised: Last year, during my trip to Kerala, I decided to take the ferry from Kochi to Alleppey. The ticket cost me around Rs. 300. The journey started at 10:00 AM from the main jetty. The views were absolutely stunning, especially passing through the backwaters. It took roughly 3 hrs to reach Alleppey. Next time, I'm planning a longer cruise along the Konkan coast, maybe from Mumbai to Goa, supposedly takes about 24 hrs, though I heard tickets can cost upwards of â‚¹5000! Heard the sunsets are amazing from the sea.
normalised: Last year, during my trip to Kerala, I decided to take the ferry from Kochi to Alleppey. The ticket cost me around rupee three hundred. The journey started at ten A.M. from the main jetty. The views were absolutely stunning, especially passing through the backwaters. It took roughly three hours to reach Alleppey. Next time, I'm planning a longer cruise along the Konkan coast, maybe from Mumbai to Goa, supposedly takes about twenty four hours, though I heard tickets can cost upwards of rupee five thousand! Heard the sunsets are amazing from the sea.
